name: Dedenne
author: 5ban Graphics
flavor_text: Its whiskers serve as antennas. By sending and receiving electrical waves, it can communicate with others over vast distances.

attacks.name: Entrainment
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Energy Short
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
